visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a spline chart with the title 'Monthly Average Temperature'. The chart should have styled axes and labels with specific colors and font sizes. The data series should represent the monthly average temperature for a year, with custom colors for the series. Additionally, configure the chart with a white background, custom margins, and a legend positioned at the bottom.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object is configured to render a spline chart titled 'Monthly Average Temperature'. The chart features styled axes and labels with specific colors and font sizes to enhance readability. The data series represents the monthly average temperature for a year, with custom colors applied to the series. The chart background is set to white, and custom margins are applied to provide better spacing. Additionally, the legend is positioned at the bottom of the chart, centered horizontally, with styled text to match the overall theme.
